name: "Armored" Scrats
description: These Scrats are surprisingly hardy. Maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: Annihilator
description: This is as big as guns get.. Yes, it does area damage!

name: Assassin
description: The Assassin stays invisible while not attacking or taking damage. Deals triple damage when he attacks from invisibility.

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A though but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots at all nearby targets.

name: Banner Man
description: The Bannerman '''Inspires''' all other nearby friendly minions -with the power of colored cloth!

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: A fierce fighter who attacks faster when surrounded by enemies. Also a big fan of monkey business

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Light ranged Minion that deals heavy damage to buildings only.

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: A popular UFO weapon, deals massive damage in a small area over a few seconds, Double damage against minions.

name: Black Hole
description: Suck up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the game for the rest of it's duration.

name: Blastmancer
description: When Blastmancer is attacking an enemy that dies, all enemies take 20 damage - he's a real party killer!

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Blood Imps
description: Small ritualistic imps. Their master loses health equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage!

name: Blue Golem
description: Solid as a Rock, hard to destroy and it hurts when it hits you.

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an egg and explodes on contact or death and deals a lot of area damage!

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives its Master extra XP for each of its kills.

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates 15 XP over 60 sec - regards, XP INC.

name: Call To Arms
description: Replace each of your Buildings with a Warrior.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Powerful single target shooter that rolls backwards when shooting.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A torrent of lightning that keeps bouncing until there are no targets left in range.

name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.

name: Colossus
description: It swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it. It's probably the best at what it does.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged unit group, low health and damage, but good friends.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Place a guild of jolly Crossbowmen, try to give them enough time to start a community.

name: Daggerfall
description: Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 100 counter damage and stuns them for 3 second.

name: Demon Warrior
description: Becomes more and more powerful, gains +170 health and +40 damage whenever she is played.

name: Disruptor Puffs
description: When on a bridge they each increase the mana cost of a random opponent card SLOT by 2.

name: Divine Warrior
description: A typical [[Warrior|warrior]] woman... BUT! She comes with a shield that makes her immune to damage for 8 sec.

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] whenever its Master plays a 3-cost or higher spell.  Because dragons love magic.

name: Dragon Pack
description: A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Has wings, which is good against melee ground minions.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good sway takes care of them.

name: Drone Force One
description: Powerful, but the firing crew left to become fishermen, so the pilot is busy.

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster. The armor plating does it.

name: Fire Imp
description: A pyromaniac whose magic leaves fire on the ground to incinerate groups of enemies.

name: Fireball
description: Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay.  On contact or death, he blows up to deal 150 damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes '''Cursed'''

name: Ghost Turret
description: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.

name: Grenadier
description: Throws explosives, good at dealing with groups of enemies.

name: Guardian
description: This hunk of health guards nearby allies, absorbing any damage they take.

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals its Master by 25 health per sec.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions by 400. Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Hypnotize
description: After a short delay, enemy minions caught in the area are hypnotized and join your side for 5 seconds.

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a Cleaver with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 30 damage!

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 3 [[Plasma Marines]] wherever you want!

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 [[Legionnaires]], but 7 if your opponent controls both bridges!

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Destroys one random enemy Minion or Building.

name: Living Statue
description: Has a lot of health, but only attacks buildings.

name: Magma Storm
description: Call down 10 magma rocks in an area over 5 sec. Each rock deals 200 damage to ANYTHING in a small area (but only 10% to Masters)

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: When spawned, he roars dealing 50 damage and knocking back nearby ground enemies.  When killed he roars again.

name: Musketeer
description: An elegant fencer who periodically will duck, dip, and deflect melee attackers, then riposte for double damage.

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Small, quick and unarmored, just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!

name: Prowler
description: "This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies hitting twice as hard!"

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] or a [[Warrior]] or 3 [[Crossbow Dudes]] and gives them '''Rage!'''

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast towards buildings (he hates them), efficient at deconstruction!

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions '''Rage!'''

name: Re-boomer
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay.  As a boomer it explodes on contact or death, but like a phoenix another one will rise from the slime.

name: Red Golem
description: When played, it gains double health if it's Master is below 50% health

name: S.T.INT
description: The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - is fast, agile and packs quite a punch for its size.  Can't take too much punishment though.

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small squeaky Scrats.

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building. Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Two weak melee minions, good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank closes it's lid and becomes completely immune to damage.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: Still a group of weak ranged units. Still great friends. Now comes with a '''Shield'''

name: Shock Rock
description: Drop a stunning stone on your enemies, which stuns and damages them.

name: Snake Druid
description: A flying wiseman, who uses his favorite branches to immobilize enemies.

name: Sniper Scrat
description: A Scrat with a sniper rifle.  Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: Sucks out the soul of anyone he kills, increasing his attack speed!

name: Spear Throwers
description: A group of average melee fighters, but their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage!

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Summons 2 Spirits over 6 seconds. Each Spirit flies to a random friendly Minion giving it 100 extra health

name: Spirit Vessel
description: When killed, its spirit flies to a random friendly Minion and gives it 100 extra health.

name: Spiritmancer
description: Rips the spirit from dying enemies it's attacking. The spirit flies to a random friendly Minion, giving it 100 extra health.

name: Stun Blast
description: A large stun explosion, that leaves your enemies vulnerable.

name: Stun Lancers
description: Their attacks will stun any enemy for two whole seconds! Shocking!

name: Styxi
description: He gets depressed when missing a kill shot, making him aim carefully for 10 sec before he shoots again! Luckily he's good at hiding.

name: Succubus
description: Is able to blink away from melee attackers when hit.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons a lot of Swarmers over time.

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: An old but durable fighter that heals itself when no enemies are near. Not a big fan of monkey business

name: Troubadour
description: He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly. This makes all nearby enemies interested in stopping him!

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Average melee Minion that resurrects after 25 seconds the first time it dies. As if defying death once wasn't enough!

name: Walking Blind Date
description: Walks along peacefully until killed, then becomes a random 4 mana Minion card!

name: Wall
description: Plenty of health, no attack. A perfect distraction for building haters

name: Warrior
description: High health and fairly good melee damage.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: A melee area damage dealer with decent health - has a hard time socializing.

name: Wizard Puff
description: If he dies, it will polymorph a random enemy Unit into a friendly Mana puff!

name: Xiao Long
description: Punishes opponent Master for 250 damage every time he casts a Spell

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flying over the battlefield it drops bombs on unsuspecting buildings!
